title: Total non-resident travellers entering the country in Canada 2021
summary: This line chart plots the Total number of foreign travelers entering Canada over the year of 2021 .
The number of travelers starts at around 123583.0 million in January , but then between February and April , the number plummets down to less than 123583.0 % .
Then , until December , the number remains steady , only rising slightly past 123583.0 million by the end of the year .
gold: This graph shows the total non-resident travelers entering Canada during the year 2021 , each month . The graph was mostly stable from Jan to Apr , after which there is a general upward trend . Although , there was a declining trend from Aug to Nov .
